item.title: Excelsoft Technologies Q2 Results: EBIT Surges 180% with Margin Expansion
item.description: Top News Excelsoft Technologies Q2 Results: EBIT Surges 180% with Margin Expansion 12 hours ago Excelsoft Technologies reported outstanding Q2 financial performance with EBIT jumping 180.49% to ₹115 million and EBIT margin more than doubling to 17.80% from 7.36%. The company also achieved 79.66% growth in consolidated profit to ₹106 million and 15.98% revenue growth to ₹646 million, demonstrating exceptional operational leverage and margin expansion.

item.title: Jash Engineering To Buy 90% Stake In WesTech Process Equipment For ₹31.37 Crores
item.description: Jash Engineering To Buy 90% Stake In WesTech Process Equipment For ₹31.37 Crores 11 hours ago Jash Engineering Limited has announced a strategic acquisition of 90% stake in WesTech Process Equipment India Private Limited for ₹31.37 crores. The cash transaction involves purchasing 53,99,849 equity shares and is expected to complete by January 15, 2026. WesTech operates in industrial process equipment with consistent revenue growth from ₹31.28 crores in 2021-22 to ₹56.01 crores in 2024-25.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 17 hours ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: Reliance Retail Considers IPO Within Three Years
item.description: Reliance Retail Considers IPO Within Three Years 1 day ago Reliance Retail, India's largest retail chain and a subsidiary of Reliance Industries, has announced plans to potentially launch an Initial Public Offering (IPO) within the next three years. This move could provide investors an opportunity to participate in India's retail sector growth, enhance the company's access to capital, and increase operational transparency. As India's largest retail chain, Reliance Retail's potential IPO could be a significant event in the Indian market.

item.title: Reliance Retail Plans IPO Launch Within Three Years
